name: axios

name: axios

text: Programs at community colleges and technical schools that require hands-on learning — like welding or auto repair — have a unique challenge as they try to stay open amid the pandemic. https://t.co/duFd3yXSK5

text: The RNC's softer moments were designed to create a permission structure for nervous suburbanites to vote for Trump despite possible stigma in their social circles, a Trump aide told Axios. https://t.co/kl6CphAyBB

name: axios

name: axios
text:
Most people across 14 wealthy countries surveyed by Pew tend to think their country has handled the pandemic well — and in Denmark and Australia that view is near-universal.

There are two exceptions to the generally positive outlook: the U.S. and U.K.
